member.name: F:MongoDB.Driver.ReadConcernLevel.Linearizable
member.summary: Avoids returning data from a "stale" primary (one that has already been superseded by a new primary but doesn't know it yet). It is important to note that readConcern level linearizable does not by itself produce linearizable reads; they must be issued in conjunction with w:majority writes to the same document(s) in order to be linearizable.

member.summary: Executes a Query protocol.
member.param: The number of documents to skip.
if set to true sets the SlaveOk bit to true in the query message sent to the server.
if set to true the server is allowed to return partial results if any shards are unavailable.
if set to true the server will not timeout the cursor.
if set to true the OplogReplay bit will be set.
if set to true the query should return a tailable cursor.
if set to true the server should await awhile before returning an empty batch for a tailable cursor.
member.returns: The result of the Insert protocol.

member.summary: Executes a Query protocol.
member.param: The number of documents to skip.
if set to true sets the SlaveOk bit to true in the query message sent to the server.
if set to true the server is allowed to return partial results if any shards are unavailable.
if set to true the server will not timeout the cursor.
if set to true the OplogReplay bit will be set.
if set to true the query should return a tailable cursor.
if set to true the server should await awhile before returning an empty batch for a tailable cursor.
member.returns: A Task whose result is the result of the Insert protocol.

member.summary: Executes an Update protocol.
member.param: if set to true the Update can affect multiple documents.
if set to true the document will be inserted if it is not found.
member.returns: The result of the Update protocol.

member.summary: Executes an Update protocol.
member.param: if set to true the Update can affect multiple documents.
if set to true the document will be inserted if it is not found.
member.returns: A Task whose result is the result of the Update protocol.

member.summary: The output of the map-reduce operation is merged with the output collection. If an existing document has the same key as the new result, apply the reduce function to both the new and the existing documents and overwrite the existing document with the result.

member.name: T:MongoDB.Driver.Core.WireProtocol.Messages.QueryMessage
member.summary: Represents a Query message.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The number of documents to skip.
if set to true it is OK if the server is not the primary.
if set to true the server is allowed to return partial results if any shards are unavailable.
if set to true the server should not timeout the cursor.
if set to true the OplogReplay bit will be set.
if set to true the query should return a tailable cursor.
if set to true the server should await data (used with tailable cursors).
A delegate that determines whether this message should be sent.
